attributes.action: Every driver should have to retake their driving test every 10 years
attributes.additional_details:
I'm fed up of incompetent drivers not being able to drive from A to B without hitting anything and causing unavoidable accidents.

Rush hour on a motorway is bad enough without these idiots causing miles of tailbacks.

Retesting all drivers every 10 years will help remove these drivers from our roads and make our roads a safer place to drive.

This issue really needs to be addressed and something has got to be done.
